text:
Can you add HubSpot module options into a stylesheet? Say I want to give the user padding options can I add into my stylesheet

padding-top: {{ <http://module.padding.top|module.padding.top> }}px;Â (edited)

I'm not sure if thats possible. But you can do the same with a class name and just style the classname.

Module css, as far as i know, is only loaded once on a page. So the second time you might load the module, it gets the styling of the first module.
<@U015V8UGJ1E> I thought about that last night. I think thats the better idea. Thanks
